meta.job_title: AVP and Assistant General Counsel (Annuities & PRT)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legal advice to the pension risk transfer unit on all aspects of group annuity transactions.
Draft, review and negotiate GACs, commitment agreements, legal contracts and administrative services agreements.
Oversee document review, due diligence and preparation process for PRT matters.
Ensure compliance with applicable local, state, federal, and foreign laws and regulations affecting the company.

education_certification.credential: JD from an accredited law school, licensed to practice in Texas
